metadata.title: Privacy Policy | Quantum NIL
metadata.subtitle: Learn about how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

content.intro: At Quantum NIL, your privacy is a priority. We are committed to handling your personal data responsibly and transparently, in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable data protection laws.

who_we_are.title: 1. Who We Are
who_we_are.content: Quantum NIL is a technology company specializing in advanced Nanoimprint Lithography (NIL). Our website address is:

data_collection.title: 2. What Data We Collect
data_collection.content: We may collect and process the following personal data:

items.identification: Identification & Contact Data: Name, email address, phone number, company name
items.usage: Usage Data: IP address, browser type, device information, pages visited, time spent on the site
items.marketing: Marketing Preferences: Opt-in choices for newsletters or updates

legal_bases.title: 3. Legal Bases for Processing
legal_bases.content: We only collect and process your data where we have a legal basis to do so:

items.consent: Consent â€“ when you opt in to communications or cookies
items.contract: Contractual necessity â€“ when you contact us for support or quotes
items.interest: Legitimate interest â€“ for website analytics and security
items.legal: Legal obligation â€“ when required by law

items.services: To provide and improve our services and website
items.inquiries: To respond to your inquiries or requests
items.marketing: To send marketing communications if you have opted in
items.analytics: To analyze user behavior for performance and security

data_sharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
data_sharing.content: We do not sell your data. We may share your personal data with:

items.providers: Service providers (hosting, analytics, email platforms) bound by confidentiality agreements
items.authorities: Legal or regulatory authorities when required

data_retention.title: 6. Data Retention
data_retention.content: We keep your data only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy or as required by law.

your_rights.title: 7. Your Rights (Under GDPR)

items.erase: Erase your data ("right to be forgotten")

your_rights.contact: To exercise your rights, please contact us at:

international.title: 8. International Transfers
international.content: If we transfer your data outside the European Economic Area (EEA), we ensure it is protected by appropriate safeguards (e.g., Standard Contractual Clauses).

changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Changes will be posted on this page with a revised "Last Updated" date.
